participant_1.background:
I want to show my music to the world!
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.

participant_2.background:
I try new things to keep myself young.
I picked up my guitar and started playing.
i have a strange obsession with pens.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well. How are you?
I'm doing great! I'm a musician and I'm excited to show my music to the world.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I'm really into alternative rock right now.
I love alternative rock! Who are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Strokes, The Killers, and Arctic Monkeys.
Those are all great bands! I'm more into the indie side of alternative rock, like The 1975 and The Neighbourhood.
I love those bands too! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Me too! I have a strange obsession with pens, so I always end up buying new ones.
That's cool! I've never been into pens, but I do like collecting vintage clothing.
That's awesome! I love to go thrifting. I always find the best stuff.
Me too! I love finding unique pieces that no one else has.
Me too! I'm always on the lookout for new things to add to my collection.
Same here! I love finding unique pieces that no one else has.
I think we're going to get along great
